title: Search Posts by Keywords
want: Search for posts by keywords (e.g., "chicken pasta", "vegan dessert") to find specific recipes
benefit: I can quickly find recipes that match what I'm craving or planning to cook
criteria: User can enter keywords in a search bar and receive relevant post results
Results are ranked by relevance to the search query
Search returns results within 2 seconds for typical queries
Search matches against post titles, descriptions, ingredients, and tags
subtasks: Implement full-text search indexing on posts (title, description, ingredients, tags)
Build search API endpoint with pagination and relevance scoring
Create search results UI with post preview cards
Add analytics tracking for search queries and result clicks

title: Search Users by Name
want: Search for users by username or display name
benefit: I can find and follow specific creators whose content I enjoy
criteria: User can search for other users by typing a username or display name
Results show user avatar, username, display name, and follower count
Partial matches and case-insensitive matching are supported
Tapping a user result navigates to their profile
subtasks: Build user search API endpoint with prefix and fuzzy matching
Create user result card component with avatar and metadata
Integrate user search tab into the search UI
Index username and display name fields for efficient lookup

title: Search Result Filters
want: Apply filters to search results: dietary tags, cuisine type, meal type, cooking time, difficulty
benefit: I can narrow down results to find exactly the type of recipe I need
criteria: Filter options are available for dietary tags, cuisine type, meal type, cooking time, and difficulty
Multiple filters can be applied simultaneously
Active filters are clearly displayed and individually removable
Filtered results update in real time as filters are toggled
subtasks: Design and implement filter UI panel with collapsible sections
Extend search API to accept filter parameters and apply them to queries
Persist selected filters during the search session
Display active filter chips with remove capability above results

title: Search Autocomplete Suggestions
want: See search suggestions and autocomplete as I type
benefit: I can find what I'm looking for faster without typing the full query
criteria: Suggestions appear in a dropdown as the user types at least 2 characters
Suggestions include popular searches, matching tags, and matching recipe titles
Tapping a suggestion immediately executes that search
Suggestions update within 300ms of keystroke input
subtasks: Build autocomplete API endpoint with debounced query support
Maintain a popular/trending search terms index for suggestion ranking
Create autocomplete dropdown UI component with keyboard and tap navigation
Implement client-side debouncing to limit API calls while typing

title: Recent Searches
want: See recent searches for quick re-access
benefit: I can quickly repeat previous searches without retyping them
criteria: Recent searches are displayed when the user taps the search bar before typing
Up to 10 most recent searches are shown in reverse chronological order
Tapping a recent search re-executes that query
subtasks: Store recent search queries locally on the device
Display recent searches list in the search bar focus state
Implement tap-to-search on recent search items

title: Clear Search History
benefit: I can maintain my privacy and keep the search experience clean
criteria: A 'Clear All' button is visible on the recent searches list
Individual recent searches can be swiped or tapped to delete
Clearing history removes all stored search queries immediately
A confirmation prompt is shown before clearing all history
subtasks: Add clear-all button to recent searches UI with confirmation dialog
Implement swipe-to-delete on individual recent search items
Clear local storage of search history on confirmation

title: For You Personalized Feed
want: See a 'For You' feed of posts matching my interests, dietary preferences, and interaction patterns
benefit: I can discover new recipes tailored to my taste without actively searching
criteria: A dedicated 'For You' tab or feed is accessible from the main navigation
Posts shown are personalized based on user dietary preferences, liked/saved content, and followed creators
The feed refreshes with new recommendations on pull-to-refresh
Feed loads with infinite scroll pagination
subtasks: Design and implement the recommendation engine using collaborative and content-based filtering
Build the For You feed API endpoint with personalized ranking
Create the For You feed UI with post cards and infinite scroll
Integrate user preference and interaction data as inputs to the recommendation model

title: Improving Recommendations Over Time
want: Recommendations that improve over time as I interact with more content
benefit: The app becomes more useful and relevant the more I use it
criteria: The recommendation engine incorporates likes, saves, comments, and time-spent signals
Recommendations noticeably shift toward preferred content types after sustained interaction
Users can provide explicit feedback (e.g., 'Not interested') to refine recommendations
Recommendation model retrains or updates on a regular cadence
subtasks: Implement interaction event tracking pipeline (likes, saves, views, dwell time)
Build feedback loop to update user preference vectors based on interaction history
Add 'Not interested' action on recommended posts to capture negative signals
Schedule periodic model retraining or real-time preference vector updates

title: Cold Start Recommendations
want: Reasonable recommendations even before I have much interaction history, using my onboarding preferences
benefit: I get a good experience from day one instead of seeing irrelevant content
criteria: New users see relevant recommendations based on dietary preferences and interests selected during onboarding
Cold start recommendations blend popular/trending content with preference-matched content
The transition from cold start to fully personalized recommendations is seamless
subtasks: Map onboarding preference selections to initial user preference vectors
Build cold start recommendation strategy blending popular content with preference-matched content
Implement gradual transition logic from cold start to interaction-based recommendations
Create fallback recommendation set for users with no onboarding data

title: Explore Page with Curated Sections
want: Browse an Explore page with curated sections: Trending Now, Popular This Week, Based on Preferences, New from Creators You Follow, and Categories
benefit: I can discover diverse content through multiple entry points organized by relevance and freshness
criteria: Explore page displays distinct horizontal-scrollable sections for each curated category
Each section shows a minimum of 5 posts with a 'See All' option
Sections load progressively so the page feels responsive
The 'Based on Preferences' section reflects the user's dietary and cuisine preferences
subtasks: Build Explore page API aggregating data for each curated section
Create Explore page UI with horizontally scrollable section carousels
Implement section-specific data queries (trending, popular, preference-based, followed creators, categories)
Add 'See All' navigation from each section to a full list view

title: Category Browsing with Sort Options
want: Tap into a category and see all matching posts with sort options (most popular, newest, most saved)
benefit: I can explore a specific category in depth and find the best content within it
criteria: Tapping a category navigates to a dedicated page showing all posts in that category
Sort options for most popular, newest, and most saved are available and functional
The selected sort order persists during the browsing session
Results support infinite scroll pagination
subtasks: Build category detail API endpoint with sort and pagination parameters
Create category detail page UI with sort toggle and post grid
Implement sorting logic for popularity, recency, and save count
Add category header with name, description, and post count

title: Trending Food Hashtags
want: See trending hashtags related to food
benefit: I can stay up to date with what the food community is excited about right now
criteria: A trending hashtags section is visible on the Explore or Search page
Hashtags are ranked by recent usage frequency and engagement
Each hashtag displays the tag name and the number of associated posts
Trending hashtags refresh periodically to reflect current activity
subtasks: Build trending hashtags computation job based on recent post tagging frequency and engagement
Create trending hashtags API endpoint with caching
Design and implement trending hashtags UI component (chip list or ranked list)
Schedule periodic refresh of trending hashtag rankings

title: Hashtag Post Listing
want: Tap a hashtag and see all posts with that tag
benefit: I can explore all content around a specific topic or trend
criteria: Tapping a hashtag navigates to a page showing all posts tagged with it
The hashtag page displays the tag name, total post count, and a grid or list of posts
Posts are sorted by most recent by default with option to sort by popularity
Results support infinite scroll pagination
subtasks: Build hashtag detail API endpoint with post listing, sort, and pagination
Create hashtag detail page UI with header and post grid
Implement navigation from trending hashtags and in-post hashtag taps to the hashtag detail page
